subject: Paralympic Games
Track and Field
lead_paragraph: Marlon Shirley, the world’s premier amputee sprinter, is trying to become the first three-time Paralympic gold medalist in the 100 meters, having won in 2000 and 2004.
snippet: Marlon Shirley, the world’s premier amputee sprinter, is trying to become the first three-time Paralympic gold medalist in the 100 meters, having won in 2000 and 2004.
